title: Is it okay if we repost something?
body: Even though if people get tired of reading something they've already read. Maybe the people who haven't seen it can give more opinions.

replies.body: If you do that, put it in quote/the box thing and provide a link to the original probably.  Otherwise you'll just get spammed with people saying "repost" "repost" ...
Do you mean reposting a thread word for word?
Yes like an idea on concept on another board. Not just short things just big blocks of text that are ideas and other interesting stuff that people would  look into.

> [{quoted}](name=JeffLeague123,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=1qUAgrqB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-06-04T18:55:47.846+0000)
>
> Yes like an idea on concept on another board. Not just short things just big blocks of text that are ideas and other interesting stuff that people would  look into.

I'd say avoid copy-pasting unless you have something to add to said conversation after copy-pasting it. For example, awhile ago I made a Tencent post using mostly copy-pasting of information given to us by Tencent and why protesting Riot would be a bad idea. Most of it was quotes, but at the end I added insight as well. Just try to not word for word spam stuff. ^^
Something like those repeated "Zilean puns" threads gets tiring real fast.
